## Background

> Provide code examples or context (e.g., past PRs)
> e.g.
>
> - The following PRs contributed to...

## Suggested Design

> Outline concrete next steps
> e.g.
>
> - Create a test file in...

## Acceptance Criteria

> Goals & criteria for success
> e.g.
>
> - All existing and new tests pass
> - Feature is bug-free in preview/staging environment
